messages.content: Hey! Welcome to {what have you done 2022 | channel bold}!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Another fulfilling year of spending time with your friends, huh?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I've personally witnessed some pretty incredible things!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Why don't we take a look at some of those incredible things you've done?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Let's get down to the brass tacks here: you all {really | italic} love sending messages.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I count a grand total of {{messageCountThisYear | number}} in 2022 alone! Wowza! Complements the bar chart quite well if I do say so myself.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Looks like YOU also had a piece of that message-pie! A whopping {{userWordCountThisYear | number}} words making up a total of {{userMessageCountThisYear | number}} messages!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Adding this to the message-cakemix, you contributed about {{userMessagePercentageThisYear | number}}% of all messages sent this year!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I hope your birthday was all you'd wished for this year.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Specifically, you made note of wishing for {{userWish}}. Traditionally, you're not supposed to tell anybody what you wish for, but here's to hoping it came true!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: How about I quickly roll up some leaderboard stats for you? Check these out:
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Well, it was pretty straightforward this year, huh?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Not quite the rollercoaster of polish from last year, but I'm quite proud of what I managed to scrape together!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Did you know we have a slash command to give yourself any public role?
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: ...that's great Shigure, but I'm trying to wrap something up over he-
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Gosh I could talk about roles all day!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Did you know that the most popular role in the server is {{mostPopularRole | role}}?! A whole {{mostPopularRoleCount | number}} people have it!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Oh! OH! Check this out! YOU {:you:} have some pretty cool roles too!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: ...ooooo! I've never seen anyone with the {{userRareRole | role}} role! Let me take a closer look!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Woah! You must be part of some secret club or something! Only {{userPeopleWithRareRole | number}} people have that one! Wear it like a badge of honor!!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Shigure, if we could get back to the point here, I really don't want to waste any more of {{user | mention}}'s ti-.
messages.author: JermaBot

content.league: Wooooow! You like League of Legends?! I'm SOOOO sorry üò≠
content.apex: No way! You play Apex Legends?! You must have a lot of free time on your hands!
content.neither: Wow! You've seriously never played Apex or League before? Congrats on your increased chance of finding a partner!
content.both: ...woah! You play both Apex and League? Snide remark!

messages.content: Now, I remember someone claiming that there was some kind of gang war between League of Legends and Apex Legends.
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: I was curious myself and compiled a little somethin'-somethin':
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Look, Shigure. These really are great stats, but I don't think trying to split the server between League and Apex is the best idea for our celebratio-
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: You're so right!! That was an unfair comparison! Here's League vs {all | bold} the other games!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Y-Yeah like I said, no need to celebrate the separa-
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: OH- OH! {Celebration by Kool & The Gang | bold italic}!! Did you know that there are {ZERO | bold} instances of anybody playing that song on this server?
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Wow... that sure is specific, Shigure.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Look, if you don't have anything else to add, I think it's time to wrap up.
FREDBOAT!! You HAVE to show those stats we've been working on!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: I guess it's cool, Shigure, but we really should be wrapping up here!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: FredBoat! Play the server's favorite song!!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Wait what? THAT'S our most played song?!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Yeah... I don't think that's right...
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: ...must be BROKEN!! THAT TOTALLY REMINDS ME!!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: UNANIMISM!! This is your chance to show them all you're not a broken bot!!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: If I may, I prefer the term "In beta."
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: IT'S WHYD2022 DUDE YEAH YOU HAVE TO!! IT'S DO OR DIE!!!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: ...ah damn it! Hold on there's an easy fix for this...
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: As mentioned before, you're gonna have to be patient with some of these stats.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: We can start with a little popularity contest:
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: Congratulations to {{serverMostUpvotedUser | mention}} for having the most upvotes - a total of {{serverMostUpvotedUserCount | number}}.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: Don't let it go to your head.
The peak of whid this year goes to:
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: What make this so popular is genuinely beyond me.
And a similar congratulations to {{serverMostDownvotedUser | mention}} for having the most collective downvotes.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: You certainly should let this one go to your head.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: These pale in comparison to the most reacted-to images of the year!
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: Thank you, thank you. You all are too kind.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: Good stuff Unanimism! Thank you for sharing.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Y'know guys, this whole thing was actually pretty cool. I'll be real, for a while there, I was annoyed that you all kept jumping in with this stat and that... But you all showed off some really killer stuff!
Thanks for making this year's {whyd | italic} special - a real treat :)
And thank you {:you:} very much for joining me for {whyd2022 | italic}. I'm excited to see what fun things come around next year!
With that, I think it's time for us.get out of here.
{User not found: out of here | italic}
messages.author: UsBot

messages.content: UsBot, please tell me you're just here for the sendoff.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: JermaBot:  I'm trying to celebrate my cake!
messages.author: UsBot

content: Shigure:  WAIT! CAN ONE MORE STAT!
Shigure:  WAIT! ONE OF MORE STAT!
messages.author: UsBot

messages.content: Unanimism:  As mentioned for the love of... a little pale stat
JermaBot:  split my cake! You all really love wrapping up my sweet! cake!
messages.author: UsBot

messages.content: Believe me, I know that feeling all too well.
messages.author: Unanimism

messages.content: JermaBot:  I'm a bit depressing... cake!
messages.author: UsBot

messages.content: JermaBot:  Wait what? THIS is my sweet! cake!
messages.author: UsBot

messages.content: Hey notsobot! We're kind of in the middle of something here; if you don't have any stats to share I'm going to kindly ask for you to leave.
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Okay dude that's really not necessary...
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: OKAY LISTEN UP- oh wait that's a stat!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: I wish I knew what he was saying!
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: (I dunno, the stats are kinda interesting)
messages.author: Shigure

messages.content: Perlymolt, would you mind sharing what he just said?
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: "Big words coming from a little clown."
messages.author: Perlymolt

messages.content: He said that the baby is crying for mommy...
messages.author: Perlymolt

messages.content: Y'KNOW I DON'T REMEMBER INVITING THE FAULTY EXCUSE FOR AN ASSHOLE INTO THIS RECAP!
messages.author: JermaBot

messages.content: Hello! Your frustrations are heard loud and clear! Please refrain from using vulgar language while under scrutiny! Remember: SecurityBot is always watching!

messages.content: Hello! Your frustrations are heard loud and clear! Please refrain from using vulgar language while under scrutiny! Remember: SecurityBot is always watching!

messages.content: Hello! Your frustrations are heard loud and clear! Please refrain from using vulgar language while under scrutiny! Remember: SecurityBot is always watching!
